mdRecord.dcterms:title: Die-cast toy soldier
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Die-cast metal, probably lead. Some of the paint is still on the figure. Appears to be U.S. Infantryman. Possibly donated at the same time as "The Soldiers' French Phrase Book" which is in the Miscellaneous Letters and Documents manuscript collection.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: World War, 1914-1918--Military miniatures
